name: trending_gifs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool giphy.
Tool description: Giphy is an animated GIF search engine.

The Giphy API implements a REST-like interface. Connections can be made with any HTTP enabled programming language. The Giphy API also implements CORS, allowing you to connect to Giphy from JavaScript / Web browsers on your own domain.
API description: Fetch GIFs currently trending online. The data returned mirrors that used to create The Hot 100 list of GIFs on Giphy. Returns 25 results by default.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 25 if not specified.

rating.description: Restricts results to the specified rating (y, g, pg, pg-13, or r).
